name: Dragon Game
description:
This is currently still in development and the version you will play here is missing a lot of features and polish. Give it a try, and let me know your thoughts to contribute to the process and make the final thing that bit better.

You are a dragon in the days of old. Fly from level to level and leave destruction and fire in your wake. Eat up villagers, sheep, burn down forests, villages and more. Or dont?

Right now, you can:

  • Customize a dragon to your liking.
  • Eat people and burn down small villages in the mountains.
  • Burn down forests and eat sheep.
  • Collect gold from destroyed towns to increase your score.

There are some small problems with the game right now, mainly that it's very easy to break the bounds of the map and people just sometimes stand still. This is a work in progress, so this is to be expected.

This game will receive 3 updates. This is version 1, and is more of a demo than anything else. Version 2 will have more quality of life stuff like customization and maps. Version 3 will have a conclusion in the game and wrap things up. Let me know what you want to see first, and I'll do what I can.

Thanks for your time. Enjoy!

P.S. if you can come up with a better title I'll happily use it! Thanks!
